messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Ranking injuries
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/18/03 4:20:52 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... No THAT is what I was taught. *~*Elissa Jill*~* unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/18/03 4:20:52 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> For an obvious example, someone who is unconscious, in shock, with open
> abdominal injuries, will be passed by for someone with just a fractured leg,
> simply because time and resources only allow the medical team to treat those who
> will likely survive.
>
>
No THAT is what I was taught.

*~*Elissa Jill*~*
unschooling Momma to 3 beautiful brilliant people
Loving partner for life to Joey
terrible guitarist, fair singer and happy woman.






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
